attributes.action: President Mugabe - Call Fair Election or Resign
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Decades off dictorship from Robert Mugabe, has caused sever suffering & hardship, to his own people.

In the last election, President Mugabe won, because he threatened his own people with torture if his people didn't vote hjim back in, this MUST now stop.

I call the British Government, and the European Community to stand together to force a new Election, which is over seen by the British Army and "Onlookers", to ensure fairness in the vote.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
